retrieved_content.content:
```html

All Events

The information included in the What's On Data has been supplied to Tees Valley Combined Authority by Data Thistle and is subject to changes. Users are advised to check with the venue or event organiser before relying in any way on the details published here. Tees Valley Combined Authority and Data Thistle are unable to accept responsibility for any loss or liability arising from any errors, omissions or inaccuracies in these listings.

``` This output preserves the main heading of the page and includes the disclaimer text regarding the events data, as these are likely part of the meaningful content for visitors looking for event information. The rest of the page contains navigation, filters, and other elements not central to the content itself.
